Directed Situations are short situations or scenarios in which you are required to give a one sentence response in Spanish.

For example, you are given the following scenario:

Your teacher is taking up a new job overseas. Write her a farewell note and express good wishes.

In this example, you are required to

  • Acknowledge that your teacher is leaving, and
  • Express good wishes.
Suggested Responses
Buenas suerte con tu nuevo trabajo y yo espero que usted haga bien

Good luch with your new job and I hope that you do well

Felicidades en su nuevo trabajo

Congratulations on your new job


Let's have a look at another example:

You have to stay back at school this afternoon. Write the text that you send to your mother explaining why.
Suggested Responses
Yo voy a limpiar mi aula esta tarde

I am going to clean my classroom this afternoon

Mis amigos y yo vamos a un restaurante después de la escuela hoy

My friends and I are going to a restaurant after school today

Hoy tengo detención desde las 3 y las 4 de la tarde

I have detention today from 3pm to 4pm
